group_1.textCenter: (My wounds have healed a bit, but I guess it's @still not enough for me to move around freely...)
But then you saved me from her, and I decided I wouldn't follow someone just because they were strong.
And I still owe you for that.
(Sorry, Ranka...but I don't have a choice.)
(I'm gonna hit Yuna with everything I got @until there's nothin' left of me.)

group_1.textRight: Hey, where do you think you're going...?

group_1.textLeft: You know where. There's only one place you end up after crossin' this bridge.

group_1.textRight: I'm asking you what you're planning to do in @Torayamachi.

group_1.textLeft: I'm gonna die a warrior's death.

group_1.textRight: I went to our base and you weren't there. And now I find you saying stupid things like that.

group_1.textLeft: This is somethin' important to Juri the Great!

group_1.textRight: Your life is even more important.
Would you really be satisfied with such a lame-ass death?
You can't get what you want, no matter what you do.

group_1.textLeft: That's right. No matter what I do, I can't get it.
Now that she has both Torayamachi and Janomiya,
her flunkies will take me out before I can @even get close to her.
I'll never get to fight her one-on-one again.

group_1.textRight: And so you decided to just charge their base? @You're out of your mind.

group_1.textLeft: ...If you keep talkin' to me like that, I'll burn you @instead, Ranka.

group_1.textRight: Just shut up and come back to our base with me.
Even if you don't see it, the heart of Ryuugasaki @hasn't been lost.
We were right about Torayamachi trying to get the @other Ryuugasaki girls to join them.
But none of them are so easy as to just give a simple yes to an offer like that.
They admire you more than you think they do.
I mean, you really just believe what I said?

group_1.textLeft: If I can't believe you, I can't believe anyone.
But you gotta be careful too, Ranka.
Even if you didn't wanna be the second-in-command @of Monzenbashi,
that doesn't change the fact that you held that @position.
And that means there's always gonna be someone @with a grudge against you.
